tool_description: Our Financial News API is a comprehensive and accurate data source of financial news from Reuters. This API allows users to retrieve the latest financial news articles and updates from Reuters, covering topics such as stocks, bonds, commodities, currencies, and more. The API is designed to provide real-time financial news updates, and allows users to filter news based on keywords, location, and date range. This data can be easily integrated into a wide range of use cases, such as financial an...
name: Reuters Business and Financial News
title: Reuters Business and Financial News

api_list.name: Get all Market Assets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com/market-assets/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com/market-assets/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Keywords
api_list.description:
Search a keyword by name

Example of internal request:
Where keyword_name like 'Microsoft%'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com/keywords/search-keyword-by-name/Microsoft"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com/keywords/search-keyword-by-name/{keywordname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Articles by Date
api_list.description:
Get Articles by  Date
This Endpoint has a hard limit set to max 20 result per page

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: 20 results per page / starting with page 0

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com/article-date/2024-01-01/0/20"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com/article-date/{date}/{page}/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Article by Category ID and Date
api_list.description:
Get Article by category id and article date
ex :/api/v1/category-id-8/article-date-11-04-2021

category - category id from Category endpoint
date-{day-month-year}
api_list.code:
import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-business-and-financial-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
